Name: Dirty(ish) Banana cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
30 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice.
Review: Coffee liqueur, banana and cream laced with cachaça and blended to a creamy icy consistency.
History: Created in 2015 by Jorge Balbontin of Vantguard, Barcelona, Spain.
